chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Hi, si, I'm ready
cool! so right now, i'm at the start with this twig thing to my left
there's a tiny island with a tiger on it. where should i go next?
keep going straight. and you'll see another twig. on that twig, there's and island with a green, yellow and blue bird.
i see it, mate
that's a parrot! so, should i follow the parrot's direction or do something else?
correct go that way
alright! padel on, my friend
i see 3 stones and another island with a frog. what should i do next?
cross those stones to the island with the frog
hopped the stones and now with the frog! cool! what's next?
you will see an alligator and go across that way
ok mate, i'm past the crocodile now
what's next?
go up that black rock and cross the rocks, you need to go to the island with the giraffe.
oh i see mr
long neck! i'm on the giraffe island. what next?
you'll see another twig and the island has a colorful snake.
made it to the snake, creepy but cool! where to go now?
keep going sragiht
copy that! moving east, straight and steady!
you should see the treasure
yep, i see it! woohoo, we did it man! *finished*
hi there, empezamos?
si, you ready?
absolutely amigo! alright, begin by strolling left, right below that wooden bench. notice a florist stand as you cross a trail
but hold on, make a quick 180 degrees u-turn to the left before you hit the florist stand. do you see the white dog again? now, cross the trail, back to the dog
which wooden bench? are there people sitting on it?
no people on it, buddy
it's just there, a bit to your left. see it? head towards it and continue as i said before
okay im back to the dog
great job! now, with the dog on your right, trudge over the branch and start heading south
if you see another white dog chilling by a checkered picnic mat, you're on the right path
ok i see the other dog.
fantastic! walk over the mat and point toward the bowl of berries
continue moving west after touching them
okay, past the picnic?
exactly! next, you'll come across another wooden branch, crossing the river
this one takes us north though. give it a whack
okay
stellar! once you've crossed, look to the right of the bush - don't touch it - and circle it until you see the florist stand again
okay, now what?
good job, pal! now take a left and trot under that charming florist stand, heading west until you reach a big bridge
notice the bicycle riders?
yes
cool, continue past the bridge to the left
you'll see a couple of elders reading on a bench, give them a good smile, will ya?
i did, they're nice
that's the spirit! now, move southwards, just a few steps, between our elderly pals and a wooden branch you'll see up ahead
keep going until you land at a green bush next to the end of the branch
Ok,I'm there
awesome! this time, starts heading east, between the branch and the bush
a few steps, okay?
okay
there you go! you should spot a young brown deer nearby, do you see it?
Yes, I see it
yay! you did it! who's the champ? you the champ! thanks for playing along, mate
Awesome!
you did great! always fun playing with ya!
Same wit you!
thank you! looking forward to our next game!
Same
great! catch you soon then, take care!
Take care
you too, buddy! bye for now!
Bye!!
bye! have a great day!
hola, you ready?
Yes, I am
cool! i'm at the tent right now
how should i proceed?
Go south until you see the dog
found 'em, adorable! what's next?
Go east until you see a campfire
okay, i see the fire
where to now?
Go around it, towards the north and you'll pass some mushrooms. The tops are red with white circles
found the spooky 'shrooms, what's next?
Do you see the blue car below the mushrooms?
yeah, i see the car
where to from here?
Awesome, go about three steps towards the car and head down that path until you see the machine you use to look into outer space
got it, found the blue telescope! where next?
Do you see the path under it?
yeah, i see it! where do we head now?
Go west a few steps, there are some rocks, to the west.
alright, i see the rocks! what's next?
cross the rock and you should see the cabin!
aha! i see the wooden house, we're at the finish line! *finished*
hey, estas listo?
yes,
awesome! start by going southwest under that first palm tree, then make a right at the second one
by the third palm, make a sharp left and keep heading south. you're doing great!
okay
alrighty, as you head south, you'll see a little brown puppy
keep it on your right side, then veer slightly to left, and then turn right to keep heading south
I see the puppy, but i dont understand what to do
no problem! go to the left of the puppy, then slightly turn left and almost immediately turn right to keep going south
think of it like dodging the puppy
okay i see a small path between a big rock and small rock
that's the one! roll on by, keeping yourself between the big rock to your left and small rock to the right
you'll hit the water soon. keep going champ!
okay, I'm at the shore right before the water
perfect! now, stroll into the water and say hello to our crabby friend
afterwards, take a right, so you're heading west keeping close to that big rock. loving your progress!
Okay do i pass the big rock?
you got it! keep yourself wet a bit longer till you come across a medium rock
you're almost there!
Okay I see a shark up a head
whoa, cool! turn sharp right away from our sharp-toothed friend
you're doing awesome!
Towards the volleyball?
righto! back onto the land
go between that medium rock and the ball you see before continuing north. you're smashing this!
Awesome, now where?
next, turn slightly left toward the northwest, head between this swanky red tent and the chunky speaker
easy peasy!
Okay do i pass the red tent?
close! actually, circle around the tent in an arc, kind of doing a little dance around it
Got it.
you're rocking it! now head south towards the sea
but stop just before you hit the water
okay
next, take a right heading west, walking just beneath that red kayak there
you're so close!
I'm under the kayak
well done! now, take a sharp right and go north, parallel to the kayak
we're nearly there!
Okay
finally, there's a small green bush waiting for you up ahead!
